Nightshift knew his frame was toast as he looks to Wolfgang  and Polarclaw.=


" Still can't move anything.  Guys my frame and shell are beyond repair. =
At this point it would take less time and energy ya prep me for a new shell=
.  I hate ta say it but maybe it's time I traded in the wheels for paws and=
 a tail."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Sep 19, 2011, =
at 12:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >=

neuver
> > him back into robot mode. He bears the pain and allows his body =
to be
> > manipulated back as wheels give way to arms, legs, hands and feet=
. Slowly
> > he comes back to robotic form.
> >
> > " Ughh, okay, I'm there=
, stop pull'n . Thanks for the hand, I needed that."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> "Can y=
ou walk?" WOLFGANG said to NIGHTSHIFT as he tried to help him
> up. "We nee=
d to get you to the CR chamber, and see if we can get you
> fixed up."
> 
>=
 There was an explosion that rocked the shuttle.
> 
> "Whatever you care go=
ing to do, get him there quickly! This ride is
> going to get awefully bump=
y!" The voice was POLAR CLAW's and he was
> sitting in the front sit, his b=
ody covered in long scratch marks and
> wounds and part of his chest has be=
en singed by some sort of flame.
> 
> Outside the SWOOP flew past the windo=
w of the shuttle as he came
> around for another attack, he was obviously f=
ar more agile then the
> shuttle and about as well armed.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> P=
reston

"Can you walk?=

up. "We need to g=
et you to the CR chamber, and see if we can get you<br>
fixed up."<br>
<br>=

There was an explosion that rocked the shuttle.<br>
<br>
"Whatever you car=
e going to do, get him there quickly! This ride is<br>

sitting in the front si=
t, his body covered in long scratch marks and<br>
wounds and part of his ch=
est has been singed by some sort of flame.<br>
<br>
Outside the SWOOP flew =
past the window of the shuttle as he came<br>
around for another attack, he=

shuttle and about as well armed.=
